detail_desc: Brazilian briefs in soft jersey with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back. The cotton content of the briefs is organic.
Wide top in an airy cotton weave with a V-neck, pin-tucks front and back and overlocked edges. Longer at the back.
Vest top in soft viscose jersey with a low-cut back.

Long dress in airy chiffon with a deep V-neck that has a concealed hook-and-eye fastener at the bottom. Gathers at the shoulders for a gentle draping effect, long balloon sleeves and narrow cuffs with a covered button. Seam with narrow, concealed elastication at the waist, and a gently flared skirt.
Long 5-pocket shorts in cotton twill with a regular waist and slightly lower crotch.
Jumper in a cable-knit cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shirt in woven fabric with a shimmering metallic finish. Concealed buttons down the front, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Sleeveless, A-line blouse in chiffon with sequin appliqués, a small, frilled collar, gathers at the top and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Lined.
Turtle-neck jumper in a soft fine knit with low dropped shoulders, wide sleeves with beaded embroidery, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and mid-length legs.
Large collar in woven fabric with a small broderie anglaise frill trim and a concealed button at the front. Lined.
V-neck jumper in fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved shirt in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front and an open chest pocket. Yoke with a pleat at the back, and a rounded hem.

Rain jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with closed seams at critical points. Detachable hood with elasticated sides, a zip down the front and elastication at the cuffs and hem. Reflective details. Unlined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Longer cardigan in a soft, fine knit with front pockets and no buttons.
Mules with pointed toes and a decorative knot detail at the front. Imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Leggings in soft, ribbed jersey. High waist with covered elastication, and short slits at the hems.

Short dress in a patterned viscose weave with a V-neck, seam under the bust and sewn-in ties at the back of the waist. Short puff sleeves with elastication and a frill trim, and a concealed zip in one side. Unlined.
Short, 5-pocket skirt in stretch denim with a glossy pattern. High waist and zip fly with a button.
Sleeveless dresses in patterned organic cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Pyjamas in soft, patterned jersey. Top with long raglan sleeves and a gently rounded hem. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and tapered legs with cuffed hems.
V-neck playsuit in soft, stretch denim with notch lapels and buttons at the front. Short sleeves, flap chest pockets with a button, and short legs.
Dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a round neckline, long sleeves, gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Long-sleeved top in ribbed organic cotton jersey with a decorative scalloped trim around the neckline, press-stud on one shoulder and overlocked edges at the cuffs.

Balconette bra in microfibre and lace with underwired, padded cups that lift and shape. Narrow, detachable shoulder straps that can be fastened in several different ways and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Sports vest top in ribbed fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back and decorative seams at the sides. The top is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Soft, non-wired bras in cotton jersey with moulded, padded triangular cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back and lace at the hem. No fasteners.
Jacket in a textured weave with fringe trims, front pockets with a press-stud and decorative chest pockets. No buttons. Lined.
Dress in an airy cotton weave with smocking at the top, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps with bows, and a seam and flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Shopper in paper straw with two imitation leather handles and a zip at the top. Two inner compartments, one with a zip. Lined. Depth 17 cm. Height 38 cm. Width 38 cm.
Straight-cut top in airy jersey crêpe with a boat neck and short sleeves with pleated trims.
Short jacquard-weave skirt with a concealed zip in one side.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket, dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric. Slightly looser fit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and high cut at the back.
Slim-fit, high-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Shorts in woven fabric with a high waist, pleats at the front, a zip fly with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners and diagonal side pockets.
Short, fitted skirt in stretch jersey. High waist with concealed elastication and two slits at the front. Unlined.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high waist and draping at the front.
Santa costume in soft fleece. Jacket with a concealed hook and loop fastening at the front. Trousers with an elasticated waist and elasticated hems.
Hat in a sturdy, rib-knit cotton blend with a wide turned-up hem.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of trousers in soft fabric. Top with a motif on the front, press-studs on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and ribbed hems.
Tops in soft cotton jersey with a racer back and elastic hem.
Vest top in soft organic cotton jersey.

Tunic in an airy weave made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend with embroidery. Opening at the back with a covered button at the back of the neck, long balloon sleeves and wide cuffs with covered buttons. Gathered seam at the hem for added volume. Lined with a V-neck inner tunic in woven fabric with adjustable shoulder straps.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs. Made using Lycra® Beauty technology to retain the shape of the jeans and provide a sculpting effect with optimal comfort.
Jersey playsuit with a smocked bodice, small frill trim at the top, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a seam with a detachable tie belt at the waist. Short, slightly wider legs.
Push-up bra in lace with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. The underwiring is V-shaped at the front. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
5-pocket trousers in cotton corduroy with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs.
Short, off-the-shoulder blouse in a crêpe weave with elastication and a frill trim at the top and 3/4-length sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a Christmas motif.
City shorts in linen and cotton twill with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly, side pockets, flap back pockets with a concealed fastener and slim legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Hat in a soft rib knit containing glittery threads with a decorative bow on the front.
Chinos in washed cotton twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, welt back pockets and skinny legs. Skinny fit.

Wide dress in a patterned viscose weave with a small stand-up collar and V-shaped opening at the front. Long balloon sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, a seam at the hips and a gathered, flared skirt. Unlined.
A pair of metal earrings with a flower-shaped pendant. Length approx. 3.5 cm.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Three-strand necklace with metal chains and plastic beads. One of the chains has an embossed metal pendant. Adjustable length.
Classic jacket in woven fabric with a chest pocket and flap front pockets. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Calf-length dress in a patterned viscose weave with a decorative tie at the neck and matching drawstring at the waist. 3/4-length sleeves with flounced cuffs and a flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey with a rubber print on the front.

Wide, calf-length dress in a patterned weave with narrow shoulder straps and a V-neck with a decorative knot. Smocking at the back, a seam below the bust and a flared skirt with an asymmetric hem. Lined at the top.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from organic cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Oversized top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined, drawstring wrapover hood, long sleeves with stripes down the sides, and a kangaroo pocket. Soft brushed inside.

Cold shoulder blouse in an airy viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with a small frill trim, a drawstring at the top and a button at the cuffs.
ANNA GLOVER x H&M. Wide, ankle-length trousers in a patterned weave with elastication at the back of the waist, side pockets and wide, gently flared legs.
Chiffon blouse with decorative flounces, a V-neck, buttons down the front and long, wide sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Unlined.

Shirt in a patterned viscose and cotton weave with a turn-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Knee socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Jumpsuit in a stripe-print crinkled weave with elastication at the top and tie-top shoulder straps. Smocked seam at the waist and straight-cut, wide legs.
Pyjama bottoms in jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Joggers in soft, stretch denim with an elasticated, ribbed drawstring waist, fake fly, front and back pockets, and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Short, straight-cut dress in soft cotton jersey with a round, ribbed neckline, dropped shoulders and short sleeves. Gathered seams on the skirt to create soft draping.

Sports trousers in sturdy jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets with a concealed zip. Legs with taped details, a small reflective print at one side and ribbed hems. The polyester content of the trousers is recycled.
Ankle-length running tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a concealed drawstring and concealed key pocket in the waist, and legs with ventilating mesh sections and a zip at the hems..
Glittery belt in imitation leather with a metal buckle.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist, knot detail at the sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Skater skirt in a soft, fine, horizontal knit with concealed elastication at the waist. Unlined.
